property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value:
SELECT
CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_xgss') as mapkey, GPDM as code, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.WSFXRQ, 112) as rdate, GPJC as name , CONVERT(VARCHAR,WSFXRQ, 112) as onlinestart, CONVERT(VARCHAR,WSFXRQ, 112) as issuestart, CONVERT(VARCHAR,SSRQ, 112) as listdate, SGDM as purchasecode, FXmz as parvalue, FXJG as issueprice, FxSL as issuevol, WSFXZQL as lotwinrate , CONVERT(VARCHAR,ZQHGBR, 112) as lotwincodedate , ZQH as lotewincode, Qmtbfxsyl as earnings, sgsx*1.0/10000 as purchaselimit, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, ZCXS as LEADUNDERWRITER, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID from XGFXYSS A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_gsgg') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.GAXB AS LABEL, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.GGBH AS REMARK, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.GPDM AS CODE FROM GSGG A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_ssyw') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120)AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID FROM SSYW A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_cjdd') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.YJBD AS LABEL FROM YJBD A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_gncj') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID FROM GNCJ A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_gjcj') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID FROM GJCJ A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_hyxw') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.HYLB AS LABEL FROM HYDT A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_ztpl') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.ZTZMC AS LABEL FROM ZTYJ A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_jrts') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID FROM TBTS A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_scgc') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.DSJBZ AS LABEL FROM ZQSCXGYW A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_hgyj') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID FROM HGJJYJ A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_hyyj') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.HYLB AS LABEL FROM HYYJ A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_yjck') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, A.ABG AS REMARK, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.GPDM AS CODE FROM GSYJ A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_sctj') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.CC AS GPDM, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ABG AS LABEL, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.TJZL AS LABEL FROM TJZL A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_ggsd') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.GPDM AS GPDM, A.GAXB AS KEYWORD, A.ZXWRLB AS LABEL, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.GKBZ AS CZY FROM GSGG A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_qzyj') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.BKLB AS LABEL,A.HYLB AS INDUSTRY FROM BKFX A WHERE A.BKLB='权证板块' AND CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_qzdt') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, A.ZQZS AS LABEL, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.ABG AS REMARK FROM JCZS A WHERE A.ZQZS='权证' AND CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_jjdt') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, A.XXLX AS LABEL, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.JJDM AS CODE FROM JJDTYDP A WHERE A.XXLX='基金动态' AND CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_jjfx') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.YWLX AS REMARK, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.JZRQ, 120) AS EXPIREDTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.JJDM AS CODE FROM JJJYQKPS A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_jjyj') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, A.XXLX AS LABEL, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.JJDM AS CODE FROM JJDTYDP A WHERE A.XXLX!='基金动态' AND CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_jjgg') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.JJGGLB AS LABEL, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.JJDM AS CODE FROM JJQTGG A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_sbxw') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS lASTGUID FROM SBSC A WHERE A.xxlx='三板动态' AND CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_gspl') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID FROM SBSC A WHERE A.xxlx='三板评述' AND CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_ggdp') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, A.ABG AS REMARK, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.GPDM AS CODE, A.DPLX AS LABEL FROM GGDP A WHERE (A.ABG='B股' OR A.ABG='AB股') AND CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_bgdt') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, A.ZQZS AS LABEL, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.ABG AS REMARK FROM JCZS A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' AND (A.ABG='B股' OR A.ABG='AB股') order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_zqgg') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.ZQDM AS CODE, A.XXLX AS LABEL, A.HGBZ AS REMARK FROM ZQDTYDP A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' AND (A.xxlx='债券动态' or A.xxlx='国债动态') order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_zqyj') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.ZQDM AS CODE, A.XXLX AS LABEL, A.HGBZ AS REMARK FROM ZQDTYDP A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' AND (A.xxlx!='债券动态' or A.xxlx!='国债动态') order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_zqgg') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.ZQDM AS CODE, A.GGLX AS LABEL, A.ZQLX AS REMARK FROM ZQGG A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ

property.name: sqlStatementsTemplete
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,'gazx_flfg') AS MAPKEY, A.ZT AS TITLE, A.NR AS CONTENT, A.MTLY AS MEDIASOURCE, A.CC AS SOURCE, A.ZZ AS AUTHOR, A.GJZ AS KEYWORD, A.ZYXDJ AS SIGN, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.fsrq, 120) AS CREATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS UPDATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(), 120) AS INPUTTIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) AS LASTGUID, A.FLFG AS LABEL FROM FLFG A WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ZHXGRQ, 120) > '{}' order by A.ZHXGRQ
